item.description:
(I wanted to invite the extra nice women from North of Boston Boomers. They had an event planned on the original date).

Are you ready for a fun night out in Manchester? We can eat at Hart's Turkey Farm located right next door to the Clarion Hotel. There is a fairly new comedy club called Headliners there. I have been a couple of times to this comedy club and the show was really funny. Tickets are $15 for the show. I haven't seen the comediens that will be performing on Oct. 17th, but let's try it.

Having a turkey dinner will get us in the mood for Thanksgiving. I have eaten at this restaurant once and is was good but not great. The location is perfect though as it is attached to the Clarion Hotel.

You can purchase tickets online for the comedy show or call 669-2660 to reserve tickets.

Here are the websites:

www.headlinerscomedyclub.com

www.hartsturkeyfarm.com

I hope to see you all there!!!

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Date change---Turkey Dinner and Comedy Night
